page.title: APEC Nations Work on Stronger Security Resolutions
page.text: <p></p><p> By Fiona Ortiz</p><p> SANTIAGO, Chile (Reuters) - Pacific Rim trading nationsagreed they should work harder to control the production andtrade of shoulder-launched missiles to keep them out of thewrong hands, foreign and trade ministers meeting in Chile saidin a resolution on Thursday.</p>
